Attribute: Simplify KPI Blocks with Missing Data
Description: Simplify (remove sparkline, bullet chart, actions, statistics and contact) KPI block widget if a valid Sparkline and Bullet Chart cannot be rendered.
Display a sparkline (trend) on KPI Blocks (note: this setting can be overridden on each block).

Attribute: Show Bullet Chart on KPI Blocks
Description: Display a bullet chart on KPI Blocks (note: this setting can be overridden on each block).

Attribute: Show Status History Chart on KPI Blocks
Description: Display a status history chart on KPI Blocks (note: this setting can be overridden on each block).
Display statistics on KPI Blocks (note: this setting can be overridden on each block).
Display actions on KPI Blocks (note: this setting can be overridden on each block).
Display KPI contact on KPI Blocks (note: this setting can be overridden on each block).
